meanings.definition: A person who jokes or jests.
meanings.sent1: The class clown was known as the japers in our school.
meanings.sent2: The comedian made everyone laugh with their japers.
meanings.sent3: The japers at the party had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: His japers were like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The japers of the group always kept the mood light and cheerful.

meanings.sent1: Japers! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: Japers, you really caught me off guard with that joke.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden appearance was met with a chorus of japers from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: Japers! The magician's trick left everyone amazed and puzzled.
